def get_acl(self): """ Gets the ACL of the object.
:return: The ACL of the object. """ try: acl = self.object.Acl() logger.info( "Got ACL for object %s owned by %s.", self.object.key, acl.owner['DisplayName']) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't get ACL for object %s.", self.object.key) raise else: return acl
